mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW (MEMBER_FK, PET_FK, CONTENT, IMG, SCORE, OPTION_FK) value (#{member_fk}, #{pet_fk}, #{content}, #{img}, #{score}, #{option_fk})
mapper.update: update REVIEW set CONTENT = #{content}, IMG = #{img}, SCORE = #{score}, PET_FK = #{pet_fk}, MODIFIED_TIME = systimestamp where REVIEW_PK = #{review_pk} and MEMBER_FK = #{member_fk}
mapper.delete: delete from REVIEW where REVIEW_PK= #{review_pk} and MEMBER_FK =#{member_fk}
mapper.select: SELECT M.member_id AS member_id, PET.pet_pk AS pet_pk, PET.pet_name AS pet_name, PET.pet_type AS pet_type, P.product_pk AS product_pk, P.product_name AS product_name, P.img_url AS img_url, PO.option_pk AS option_pk, PO.option_name AS option_name, PO.price AS price, PS.purchase_status AS purchase_status FROM MEMBER M JOIN PET ON M.member_pk = PET.member_fk JOIN PURCHASE PR ON M.member_pk = PR.member_fk JOIN PURCHASE_STATUS PS ON PR.status_fk = PS.status_pk JOIN PURCHASE_PRODUCT PP ON PR.purchase_pk = PP.purchase_fk JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON PP.option_fk = PO.option_pk JOIN PRODUCT P ON PO.product_fk = P.product_pk WHERE M.member_pk = #{member_fk}
